channel.title: Xp Counter,
channel.description: O.K My xp counter is fine, not much wrong with it only thing is, is that no xp is being dropped only added... how can i get my xp to drop from the counter? I know you can't see the counter visible that's fine... i just want the xp to drop from it.

item.title: Xp Counter,
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

O.K My xp counter is fine, not much wrong with it only thing is, is that no xp is being dropped only added… how can i get my xp to drop from the counter? I know you can’t see the counter visible that’s fine… i just want the xp to drop from it.
